TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit UIViewControllerInteractiveTransitioning_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype UIKit.UIViewAnimationCurve GetCompletionCurve(class UIKit.IUIViewControllerInteractiveTransitioning This) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this method operates.
Docs.summary: Returns the completion curve, which controls the speed of the animation as it progresses.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.nfloat GetCompletionSpeed(class UIKit.IUIViewControllerInteractiveTransitioning This) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this method operates.
Docs.summary: Returns the overall relative speed of an animation. The default value is 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool GetWantsInteractiveStart(class UIKit.IUIViewControllerInteractiveTransitioning This) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this method operates.
